short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Klaviyo tool for checking if a website has Klaviyo JS installed and a dev tools panel for debugging events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed for developers to quickly identify if a website has the Klaviyo JS installed correctly. It also provides a developer panel for monitoring and debugging client side events sent to Klaviyo.
